# bloom #

R language bindings for dablooms.

### Example usage

```{r}
library(bloom)
bloom <- bloom(capacity = 1000, error_rate = .05, filename = "/tmp/bloom.bin")
bloom$add("foo", 2)
bloom$contains("bar")
bloom$contains("foo")
bloom$remove("foo", 2)
bloom$contains("foo")
bloom$add("foo", 2)
rm(bloom)
bloom <- bloom(capacity = 1000, error_rate = .05, filename = "/tmp/bloom.bin", exists = TRUE)
bloom$contains("foo")
```
